text: Cape Breton Island (French: île du Cap-Breton - formerly île Royale, Scottish Gaelic: Eilean Cheap Breatuinn, Míkmaq: Únamakika, simply: Cape Breton) is an island on the Atlantic coast of North America. It likely corresponds to the European word "Breton", referring to Brittany. == Other websites == * Cape Breton Wireless Heritage Society * Movement for a Free and Independent Province of Cape Breton * Cape Breton Island's 4 Men In A Tub * Cape Breton Island Directory * Caper Canada * Flags of Cape Breton Island, on Flags of the World.net website * Visit Victoria County * Hike the Highlands Festival Category:Islands of Canada Category:Atlantic islands
title: Cape Breton Island
